Name: The Black Garden
Description: Fight through the Gate and enter the Black Garden to destroy its heart.

Name: A Rising Tide
Description: Find and destroy the source of the Vex surging to protect the Black Garden.

Name: Ishtar Collective
Description: Unravel the secrets of the Vex by reviving and ancient research station of the Ishtar Collective.

Name: Exclusion Zone
Description: Survive the military power of the Cabal and find the Gate to the Black Garden.

Name: The Archive
Description: Find the Collective's lost Archive, sealed for centuries, in a vault deep beneath the Ishtar Academy.
